name: BEE-01
description:
You're a bee from a once prosperous colony, now in poverty because of the wasp kingdom and their tyranny. You can only hold out for so long before the wasps take over and kill every bee in exintence. However, after stealing one of their weapons, you rush into the fray and fight the enemy head-on!

It's up to you to defend your colony, in the hopes that one day it will flourish once more!

This was a project made by a team of 6 in 48 hours during WolverineSoft's DigiTurkey Game Jam.
